content.en: Energy forecasting algorithms: Researchers have been exploring how algorithms can improve various aspects of energy forecasting and management. They have used ensemble models, which combine multiple machine learning algorithms, to predict electricity load, photovoltaic output power, energy consumption, and more. These algorithms, such as Extreme Learning Machine (ELM), Random Forest, and Support Vector Machines, have shown promise in accurately forecasting energy-related variables and optimizing energy generation and consumption.
content.da: Energiforudsigelsesalgoritmer: Forskere har udforsket, hvordan algoritmer kan forbedre forskellige aspekter af energiforudsigelse og -styring. De har brugt ensemblemodeller, som kombinerer flere maskinlæringsalgoritmer, til at forudsige elforbrug, fotovoltaisk outputeffekt, energiforbrug med mere. Disse algoritmer, såsom Extreme Learning Machine (ELM), Random Forest og Support Vector Machines, har vist potentiale i præcist at forudsige energirelaterede variable og optimere energigenerering og -forbrug.
